events.title: Major earthquake strikes coastal city; widespread damage reported
events.description: A powerful 7.3 magnitude earthquake struck the coastal region, causing significant structural damage, power outages, and disrupting transportation. Emergency services report collapsed buildings and ongoing search-and-rescue operations.

events.title: Mass casualty incident after chemical plant explosion
events.description: An explosion at a chemical processing plant led to fires and toxic smoke affecting nearby neighborhoods. Authorities report multiple casualties and have issued shelter-in-place orders while hazmat teams respond.

events.title: Magnitude 6.1 earthquake strikes off the coast
events.description: A 6.1 magnitude quake was recorded offshore; minor damage reported in nearby towns.

events.title: Flood warnings issued for river valley
events.description: Authorities issue warnings for potential flooding following heavy rains.

events.title: Regional power outage affects multiple cities
events.description: A widespread outage impacts several cities; crews deployed.

events.title: Shelter-in-place after refinery fire declared
events.description: Officials issued emergency shelter-in-place after a major refinery fire; hazardous smoke reported. Multiple injuries confirmed; evacuations underway.

events.title: Bridge collapse shuts major highway; emergency crews deployed
events.description: A section of the river bridge collapsed during peak traffic, causing multiple vehicle incidents. Authorities report serious injuries and have closed the highway in both directions.
